thread.title: Oil prices drop on potential increase in OPEC output | Good Stock Invest

title: Oil prices drop on potential increase in OPEC output | Good Stock Invest
text:
No Comments on Oil prices drop on potential increase in OPEC output
SEOUL (Reuters) – Oil prices fell on Thursday on expectations that OPEC members will step up manufacturing in the face of worries over provide from each Venezuela and Iran. A employee walks previous the oil nicely on the Sindbad oil area close to the Iraqi-Iranian border in Basra, Iraq April 23, 2018. Picture taken April 23, 2018. REUTERS/Essam Al-Sudani
A shock construct up in crude oil inventories in the United States additionally weighed on prices, driving the unfold between Brent crude and U.S. West Texas Intermediate (WTI) near its widest in three years. CL-LCO1=R
International benchmark Brent LCOc1 futures had been down 27 cents, or 0.34 p.c, at $79.53 per barrel at 0300 GMT.
U.S. West Texas Intermediate (WTI) crude CLc1 futures had been down 17 cents, or 0.24 p.c, at $71.67 a barrel.
The Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) could determine to increase oil output to make up lowered provide from Iran and Venezuela in response to considerations from Washington over a rally in oil prices, OPEC and oil business sources instructed Reuters.
Supply considerations in Iran and Venezuela following new U.S. sanctions had pushed each Brent and WTI to multi-year highs, with Brent breaking by an $80 threshold final week for the primary time since November 2014.
“The chat is still that OPEC will do something at its June meeting in reaction to the looming prospect of a fall in crude production and exports from both Iran and Venezuela as the year progresses,” mentioned Greg McKenna, chief market strategist at CFD and FX supplier AxiTrader.
OPEC and a few non-OPEC main oil producers are scheduled to fulfill in Vienna on June 22. The group beforehand agreed to curb their output by about 1.eight million barrels per day to spice up oil prices and clear a provide glut.
“Any signs that the group may be heading towards an early exit from the production cut agreement would weigh on prices,” ANZ financial institution mentioned in a word.
Meanwhile, industrial U.S. crude inventories rose C-STK-T-EIA by 5.eight million barrels in the week to May 18, beating analyst expectations for a lower of 1.6 million barrels, the Energy Information Administration (EIA) mentioned on Wednesday.
Elsewhere, Libya, which is an OPEC member, lower its oil manufacturing by about 120,000 barrels per day as unusually scorching climate prompted energy issues, an official from the National Oil Corp mentioned on Wednesday.
Stephen Innes, head of buying and selling for Asia-Pacific at futures brokerage OANDA in Singapore, mentioned that prices had been getting some assist from speak that Sinopec, Asia’s largest refiner, would increase U.S. crude oil imports to a report excessive.
“Recent flow is suggesting short-term traders are looking to sell the $80 per barrel chart-toppers anticipating a possible compliance shift within the OPEC-Non Opec supply agreement,” he added in a word on Thursday. Reporting by Jane Chung and Jessica Jaganathan; Editing by Joseph Radford Share this:
